languages.text: "Проклятье, как глаза жжет-то, хоть новые вставляй! И эти еще вопят... Слышу, как дружочки из-за дверки эту линзу учуяли, бормочут ей что-то... Чую ее мерзкую, липкую энергию. Вот же дрянь!"

traits.locale_text: "Проклятье, как глаза жжет-то, хоть новые вставляй! И эти еще вопят... Слышу как дружочки из-за дверки эту линзу учуяли, бормочут ей что-то... Чую ее мерзкую, липкую энергию. Вот же дрянь!"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Gah, my eyes are stinging like crazy! I'll need augments if this goes on much longer. And the voices are still howling... I can hear my little friends behind the door sniffing at this lens, muttering to it... I can sense its foul, clammy energy. A nasty piece of kit!"
languages.original_text: "Проклятье, как глаза жжет-то, хоть новые вставляй! И эти еще вопят... Слышу, как дружочки из-за дверки эту линзу учуяли, бормочут ей что-то... Чую ее мерзкую, липкую энергию. Вот же дрянь!"

traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Gah, my eyes are stinging like crazy! I'll need augments if this goes on much longer. And the voices are still howling... I can hear my little friends behind the door sniffing at this lens, muttering to it... I can sense its foul, clammy energy. A nasty piece of kit!"

traits.locale_text: "Gah, my eyes are stinging like crazy! I'll need augments if this goes on much longer. And the voices are still howling... I can hear my little friends behind the door sniffing at this lens, muttering to it... I can sense its foul, clammy energy. A nasty piece of kit!"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Gah, my eyes are stinging like crazy! I'll need augments if this goes on much longer. And the voices are still howling... I can hear my little friends behind the door sniffing at this lens, muttering to it... I can sense its foul, clammy energy. A nasty piece of kit!"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: “呃啊，我的眼睛要疼瞎了！如果这种情况继续下去的话，我就需要植入物了。而且那些声音还在嚎叫……我可以听到，我在门后的那些小朋友们正在嗅着这个镜片，对它窃窃私语……我感觉到了它肮脏、粘稠的能量，这玩意儿真让人想吐！”
languages.original_text: "Gah, my eyes are stinging like crazy! I'll need augments if this goes on much longer. And the voices are still howling... I can hear my little friends behind the door sniffing at this lens, muttering to it... I can sense its foul, clammy energy. A nasty piece of kit!"

traits.locale_text: “呃啊，我的眼睛要疼瞎了！如果这种情况继续下去的话，我就需要植入物了。而且那些声音还在嚎叫……我可以听到，我在门后的那些小朋友们正在嗅着这个镜片，对它窃窃私语……我感觉到了它肮脏、粘稠的能量，这玩意儿真让人想吐！”
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: «¡Agh, me pican muchísimo los ojos! Como sigamos aquí mucho tiempo, necesitaré aumentos. Y las voces siguen aullando... Oigo a mis amiguitos detrás de la puerta, olisqueando esta lente, susurrándole cosas... Puedo sentir su energía sucia y húmeda. ¡Un conjunto muy desagradable!».
languages.original_text: "Gah, my eyes are stinging like crazy! I'll need augments if this goes on much longer. And the voices are still howling... I can hear my little friends behind the door sniffing at this lens, muttering to it... I can sense its foul, clammy energy. A nasty piece of kit!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Agh, me pican muchísimo los ojos! Como sigamos aquí mucho tiempo, necesitaré aumentos. Y las voces siguen aullando... Oigo a mis amiguitos detrás de la puerta, olisqueando esta lente, susurrándole cosas... Puedo sentir su energía sucia y húmeda. ¡Un conjunto muy desagradable!».
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: 「ああっ、目が刺すように痛む！これ以上続けるとなると、増幅器が必要だわ。そして声はまだ響いている…扉の向こうの小さなお友達が、このレンズの匂いをかぎながら、それに呟いているのが聞こえる…不浄な、気持ち悪いエネルギーを感じる！」
languages.original_text: "Gah, my eyes are stinging like crazy! I'll need augments if this goes on much longer. And the voices are still howling... I can hear my little friends behind the door sniffing at this lens, muttering to it... I can sense its foul, clammy energy. A nasty piece of kit!"

traits.locale_text: 「ああっ、目が刺すように痛む！これ以上続けるとなると、増幅器が必要だわ。そして声はまだ響いている…扉の向こうの小さなお友達が、このレンズの匂いをかぎながら、それに呟いているのが聞こえる…不浄な、気持ち悪いエネルギーを感じる！」
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Gah, meine Augen brennen wie verrückt! Ich werde Augmentationen brauchen, wenn das noch länger dauert. Und die Stimmen heulen noch immer ... Ich kann meine kleinen Freunden hören, die hinter der Tür an dieser Linse schnüffeln und sie anknurren ... Ich kann ihre stinkende, klebrige Energie hören. Widerlich!"
languages.original_text: "Gah, my eyes are stinging like crazy! I'll need augments if this goes on much longer. And the voices are still howling... I can hear my little friends behind the door sniffing at this lens, muttering to it... I can sense its foul, clammy energy. A nasty piece of kit!"

traits.locale_text: "Gah, meine Augen brennen wie verrückt! Ich werde Augmentationen brauchen, wenn das noch länger dauert. Und die Stimmen heulen noch immer ... Ich kann meine kleinen Freunden hören, die hinter der Tür an dieser Linse schnüffeln und sie anknurren ... Ich kann ihre stinkende, klebrige Energie hören. Widerlich!"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: « Argh, mes yeux me piquent, c'est affreux ! Si ça continue, je vais avoir besoin d'augmentations. Et les voix qui ne veulent pas se taire... Je les entends derrière la porte renifler la lentille et lui murmurer des choses... Je perçois son énergie infâme... Une vraie saleté ! »
languages.original_text: "Gah, my eyes are stinging like crazy! I'll need augments if this goes on much longer. And the voices are still howling... I can hear my little friends behind the door sniffing at this lens, muttering to it... I can sense its foul, clammy energy. A nasty piece of kit!"

traits.locale_text: « Argh, mes yeux me piquent, c'est affreux ! Si ça continue, je vais avoir besoin d'augmentations. Et les voix qui ne veulent pas se taire... Je les entends derrière la porte renifler la lentille et lui murmurer des choses... Je perçois son énergie infâme... Une vraie saleté ! »
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Ah, gözlerim deli gibi yanıyor! Böyle devam ederse ogmentasyona ihtiyacım olacak. Sesler de uğuldamaya devam ediyor. Küçük dostlarımın kapının arkasında bu merceği kokladığını, ona mırıldandığını duyabiliyorum. Onun o kirli, rahatsız edici enerjisini hissedebiliyorum. Gerçekten nahoş bir aparat!"
languages.original_text: "Gah, my eyes are stinging like crazy! I'll need augments if this goes on much longer. And the voices are still howling... I can hear my little friends behind the door sniffing at this lens, muttering to it... I can sense its foul, clammy energy. A nasty piece of kit!"
